intro: This is the form where you can filter your ad report by date range, campaign source, event type, and report type.
Select a date range for your report. You can choose from preset ranges or manually enter a custom date range below.
If you select a custom date range, use this field to specify the start date for your report.
Specify the end date here for your custom date range.
Choose the source of the ad campaigns. You can select ads from your own videos or third-party sources like Google Ads.
Select the type of ad event you want to analyze (e.g., AdStarted, AdClicked, AdCompleted). You can also leave it blank to include all event types.
Choose the type of report you want to generate. Different options will display various views of your ad data.
If you're generating a report for a specific video, use this field to search for and select the video.
If you're generating a report for a specific user, search for and select the user here.
After setting your filters, click here to generate the report.
This is the chart that visualizes the ad events based on your selected filters. You can hover over or click on the bars to see more details.
Here is the detailed table of ad data. Each row represents an event, user, or video depending on your report type.
Click this button to download the report as a CSV file for further analysis.
